#!/bin/bash
#
# Installation script for Wurm Unlimited
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y upgrade
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl ca-certificates unzip

# Headless setup as per https://www.wurmpedia.com/index.php/Server_administration_(Wurm_Unlimited)#Linux_Headless
apt -y install libswt-gtk3-java xvfb x11vnc

Xvfb :99 &
export DISPLAY=:99

## Installing Wurm Unlimited Dedicated Server

# Download and set up SteamCMD as per https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/SteamCMD#Linux
add-apt-repository multiverse
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt -y update
apt -y install lib32gcc1

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

chown -R root:root /mnt

# Installing Wurm Unlimited
export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 402370 validate +quit

# Copying steamclient.so as per https://www.wurmpedia.com/index.php/Server_administration_(Wurm_Unlimited)#Headless
mkdir -p /mnt/server/nativelibs
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/nativelibs

cd /mnt/server
curl -sSL -o StartWU.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tehguy/eggs/add/wurm-unlimited/steamcmd_servers/wurm_unlimited/StartWU.sh
chmod +x StartWU.sh

mkdir -p ./backup
cp ./WurmServerLauncher ./backup/
cp -r ./dist/Advendure ./backup/
cp -r ./dist/Creative ./backup/

variables.name: World
variables.description: World to use when launching Wurm. The defaults provided are Creative and Adventure (case sensitive)

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum amount of people allowed to join the server

variables.name: Admin Password
variables.description: Unlocks the admin commands from within the game, that can be used to change the gameplay settings of the server, such as skill gain rate and field growth time. Leave blank to disable.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The name of the server that will be visible in server browsers. If the name contains spaces, surround it with "". For example servername="my private server"

variables.name: Clean Logs on Start
variables.description: Clear the logfile on server start

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Sets the password that is used when trying to connect to the server. Leave blank to disable.

variables.name: Mod Launcher Version
variables.description: Version of the mod launcher to download. To disable this, use "0". For a list of version numbers, refer to https://github.com/ago1024/WurmServerModLauncher/releases

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Set whether or not the server checks for and installs updates on startup. 1 for on, 0 for off
